title: BRIEF-Monitise shares fall more than 30 pct post lacklustre results, CEO exit
text:
BRIEF-Monitise shares fall more than 30 pct post lacklustre results, CEO exit Sept 9 
Sept 9 Monitise Plc : 
* Shares in Monitise fall more than 30 percent after company reports disappointing results, CEO Buse's departure Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136) Trending On Reuters
